snippet: Some of the same activists that persuaded advertisers to boycott Glenn Beck's television show on Fox News in 2009 are now mobilizing against Rush Limbaugh.
abstract: Some of the same activists that persuaded advertisers to boycott Glenn Beck's television show on Fox News in 2009 are now mobilizing against Rush Limbaugh.

headline.main: Attack by Limbaugh Awakens a 'Stop Rush' Campaign
